info.title: DECIES API
info.description: Sistema de analisis y recomendaciones pedagogicas adaptativas

post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests

schema.title: Response Get Uploads Api V1 Content Uploads Get

post.description: Triggers the LLM pipeline (E2 + E4) for the given upload_id.

get.description: Fetch all generated items for a specific upload.

schema.title: Response Get Upload Items Api V1 Content Uploads  Upload Id  Items Get

patch.description: Tutor-only: activate/deactivate an item belonging to an upload.

schema.title: Response List Activity Types Api V1 Activities Activity Types Get

post.description: Create a new activity session with randomly selected items.

get.description: Get an activity session by ID.

schema.title: Response Get Session Items Api V1 Activities Sessions  Session Id  Items Get

post.description: Record a student response as a learning event.
End an activity session and trigger metrics recalculation.

get.description: Get aggregated metrics for a student in a subject/term.
Get mastery states for all microconcepts for a student.

schema.title: Response Get Student Mastery Api V1 Metrics Students  Student Id  Mastery Get

get.description:
List all microconcepts for a subject (optionally filtered by term).

Tutor-only: the tutor must own the subject.

schema.title: Response List Microconcepts Api V1 Microconcepts Subjects  Subject Id  Get

get.description: List prerequisite relations for a microconcept (tutor-only).

schema.title: Response List Microconcept Prerequisites Api V1 Microconcepts  Microconcept Id  Prerequisites Get

post.description:
Add a prerequisite relation (tutor-only).

Validations:
- no self prerequisite
- prerequisite must belong to same subject + term
- no duplicates
- no cycles

Dev-only helper: ensures the subject/term has at least one microconcept ("General"),
and aligns items + learning_events in that scope to reference it.

This unblocks mastery calculations when the dataset has practice sessions but no
microconcept taxonomy yet.

get.description:
Get recommendations for a student.
By default runs generation logic to find new recommendations based on latest metrics.

schema.title: Response Get Student Recommendations Api V1 Recommendations Students  Student Id  Get

post.description: Record tutor decision (accept/reject) on a recommendation.

schema.title: Response List Reports Api V1 Reports Get
Response List Terms Api V1 Catalog Terms Get
Response List Subjects Api V1 Catalog Subjects Get
Response List Students Api V1 Catalog Students Get
Response List Topics Api V1 Catalog Topics Get
Response List Real Grades Api V1 Grades Get
Response List Grade Tags Api V1 Grades  Grade Id  Tags Get
Response List Items Api V1 Admin Items Get
Response List Recommendation Catalog Api V1 Admin Recommendation Catalog Get
Response List Activity Types Api V1 Admin Activity Types Get

get.description: Redis health check endpoint (used for async queue mode).
Worker health check endpoint (only meaningful when ASYNC_QUEUE_ENABLED=true).

MasteryStateSummary.title: MasteryStateSummary
MasteryStateSummary.description: Summary of mastery state for a microconcept

StudentMetricsSummary.title: StudentMetricsSummary
StudentMetricsSummary.description: Summary of student metrics for dashboard
